means: 改造，改制，重新创造( re-create的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The original ( real or virtual ) photon is re - created.
sentence.Network_cn: 原来的光子 ( 实的或虚的 ) 再度产生.

sentence.Network_en: Today, Pickett's Charge is re - created on tape at the battlefield's museum.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天在这个战场的纪念馆里有录音带重述 皮基特 率领的这次冲锋.

sentence.Network_en: The subscription is marked inactive and must be dropped and re - created.
sentence.Network_cn: 该订阅已标记为非活动的订阅,必须将其除去或重新创建.

list.abs: how to manually re - create the cluster service account ., 如何手动重新创建群集服务帐户.
get rid of predicament and re - create glory ., 走出困境再创辉煌.
perfectly re - creates star trek adventure and combat ., 完全重新造星战跋涉探险.
His mind re - creates the entire world ., 他在重新规划整个世界.
keep this information , because you'll need it if you ever have to re-create your workgroup file .请保存好这一信息，因为如果必须重新创建工作组文件时，将需要这一信息。

auth_sentence.content: Out of the slips, he re-created the tongue.
